column4: heya ^_^ annoying question, just wondering if anyone has a good WinAmp style program for Ubuntu - basically all I want is to be able to easily access online radio without a lot of fuss... Any suggestions?
online radio?  Last.fm is OK in my book.
use the repository package though.  sudo apt-get install lastfm.  you'll need to set up an account at their website though.
yeah, that's happened to me.  If you find the solution, could you share a link?  that'd be really sweet of you.
